template: SELECT MIN(role_type.role) AS role_type_role, MIN(movie_companies.company_id) AS movie_companies_company_id FROM complete_cast, cast_info, movie_companies, title, role_type WHERE cast_info.movie_id = title.id AND cast_info.role_id = role_type.id AND complete_cast.movie_id = title.id AND movie_companies.movie_id = title.id AND cast_info.note IN ('(voice)', '(voice: Japanese version)', '(voice) (uncredited)', '(voice: English version)') AND movie_companies.note NOT LIKE %s AND cast_info.note LIKE %s AND title.episode_nr < %s AND movie_companies.note LIKE %s AND title.production_year BETWEEN 1955 AND 2000 AND title.production_year > %s AND title.episode_nr > %s AND title.production_year < %s AND role_type.role = %s;
